content.description: United States Bureau of Labor Statistics
content.question: A development related to the overall trend from 1960 to 1980 depicted on the graph was the

choices.label: increase in public concern regarding air and water quality
widespread replacement of male factory workers with female workers
creation of the first trusts and monopolies
ban of free-trade agreements between North American countries

content.answer: increase in public concern regarding air and water quality

topic.text: 8.13: The Environment and Natural Resources from 1968 to 1980

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
